job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of human expertise with AI systems to improve the AI's performance, which falls under improving existing systems and integrating different capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions participating in AI model fine-tuning sessions, which is a core task in model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new AI tools and methodologies aligns with the experimental and development aspects of AI model work.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of AI capabilities into a support system to enhance its functionality, fitting the definition of software development and integration.

soft_skills.phrase: taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: The mention of a rapid ramp-up period implies a need for quick learning and adaptability to new products and systems.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the need for self-sufficiency and problem-solving skills, indicating an expectation for the candidate to unblock themselves.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses on integrating AI capabilities into customer support systems and improving existing AI models through feedback and fine-tuning. While there's mention of AI model fine-tuning and prototyping, the primary emphasis is on applying and improving AI within a broader application context (customer resolutions), rather than core AI research or development. The role is about supporting and enhancing an AI-augmented system, making 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' the most fitting profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI integration and improvement within a support context. The tasks lean towards applying AI rather than deep model building. The 'What you will NOT be doing' section also provides useful context. However, the specific technologies or AI models are not mentioned, and the 'fine-tuning' aspect could be interpreted in different ways, slightly reducing absolute certainty.
